Plot: Based on the True story of Journalist Gary Webb. The film takes place in the mid 1990s, when Webb uncovered the CIA's past role in importing huge amounts of cocaine into the U.S. that was ...
Title: Kill the Messenger
Writer: Peter Landesman, Gary Webb (book), Nick Schou (book)
Actors: Jeremy Renner, Robert Patrick, Jena Sims, Robert Pralgo
tomatoConsensus: Kill the Messenger's potent fury over the tale of its real-life subject overrides its factual inaccuracies and occasional narrative stumbles.
